page.title: 06ADVENTURE PLAYGROUND
page.content: One way of spending your free time on the Warwick Estate is to visit the Adventure Playground.There are two buildings joined in the middle and an area of wooden and rope structures for climbing and playing on.We play at tigs,hide and seek and set ourselves obstacle courses to tackle on the structures.The buildings house a T.V. room,a pool room,a kitchen,an activities room and a storeroom. The Playground is run by a committee and is open every weekday between 4.00 p.m. and 8.00p.m.and between 12.00p.m. and 4.00p.m. at weekends. Ann is in charge of the Adventure Playground.When you go in you have to sign your name.You have to abide by the rules and if there is any fighting,throwing pool balls or swearing you will be banned for a month.
